title: [Capstone] NEED TO JOIN A CAPSTONE TEAM
content:
I'm a student of EC campus currently going to the 5th Semester .   
I belong to the 'B' Category (GPA less than 8)

I haven't joined a team yet .  
I am open to work and contribute on any Domain of Project .  
So if there is a vacancy for a 'B' category Guy , please DM me .

comments.body: I‚Äôm in 3rd sem and just wanted to get an idea , what CGPA counts for each category in Capstone?

A: CGPA 8.00 and above  
B: CGPA 7.00 ‚Äì 7.99  
C: CGPA 6.99 and below
Okay thanks. So there is no separate division for CGPA 9.0 and above, right?
Okay thanks. So there is no separate division for CGPA 9.0 and above, right? Also, off-topic, are all semesters till the 6th semester 24 credits each?
